title: I lost a skin?
body: So my friend bought me Officer {{champion:254}} like a few weeks ago but all of a sudden when I go into my champions the skin doesn't show up as "Owned" any more. What happened? Was there a rollback? I have proof, it's in my gifting history

replies.body: Actually play Vi and you'll see it. Same thing for me
But I can't even select the skin in lobby, says I don't have it

> But I can't even select the skin in lobby, says I don't have it

Then send a support ticket to Riot if it still persists. Maybe restarting the client might help.
